	local VectorMask = Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)
	local Direction = RootPart.AssemblyLinearVelocity * VectorMask

	if Direction.Magnitude <= 0.1 then
		Direction = Camera.CFrame.LookVector * VectorMask
	end

	Direction = Direction.Unit
	local PlaneDirection = Vector2.new(Direction.X, Direction.Z)

	local DashVelocity = PlaneDirection * DashSpeed

	return DashVelocity
end

function PlayDashAnimation()
	DashForwardAnim:Stop()
	DashLeftAnim:Stop()
	DashRightAnim:Stop()
	DashBackAnim:Stop()

	if UserInputService.MouseBehavior ~= Enum.MouseBehavior.LockCenter then
		DashForwardAnim:Play()
		return
	end

	if HeldKeys.W then
		DashForwardAnim:Play()
		return

	elseif HeldKeys.A then
		DashLeftAnim:Play()
		return

	elseif HeldKeys.S then
		DashRightAnim:Play()
		return

	elseif HeldKeys.D then
		DashBackAnim:Play()
		return
	end

	DashForwardAnim:Play()
end

function HandleCooldown()
	if DashMobileButton then
		DashMobileButton.ImageColor3 = CooldownImageColor
	end

	local CooldownStarted = tick()
	local LastTick = tick()

	while tick() - CooldownStarted < CooldownDuration do
		RunService.PostSimulation:Wait()

		local DeltaTime = tick() - LastTick
		LastTick = tick()

		local StartFOV
		if LinearVelocity.Enabled == false then
			if Camera.FieldOfView > DefaultFOV then
				if not StartFOV then
					StartFOV = Camera.FieldOfView
				end

				local LerpAmount = DeltaTime * 10
				local NewFOV = Lerp(StartFOV, DefaultFOV, LerpAmount)

				Camera.FieldOfView = NewFOV
			end
		end
	end

	Camera.FieldOfView = DefaultFOV

	if DashMobileButton then
		DashMobileButton.ImageColor3 = NormalImageColor
	end

	OnCooldown = false
end

function HandleDashDuration()
	local DashStarted = tick()
	local StartFOV = Camera.FieldOfView
	local GoalFOV = DefaultFOV + DashFOVIncrease
	local LastTick = tick()

	while tick() - DashStarted < DashDuration do
		RunService.PostSimulation:Wait()

		if Camera.FieldOfView < GoalFOV then
			local DeltaTime = tick() - LastTick
			LastTick = tick()

			local LerpAmount = DeltaTime * 20
			local NewFOV = Lerp(Camera.FieldOfView, GoalFOV, LerpAmount)

			Camera.FieldOfView = NewFOV
		end

		if IsDashBlocked() then
			break
		end
	end
end

function IsDashBlocked()
	local RayOrigin = RootPart.Position
	local RayDirection = RootPart.CFrame.LookVector
	local RayDepth = DashRange

	local Raycast = Workspace:Raycast(RayOrigin, RayDirection * RayDepth, RaycastParameters)

	if Raycast and Raycast.Instance.CanCollide and Raycast.Instance.Anchored then
		return true
	end
end

function DashEffects()
	DashSound:Play()
end

function EnableLinearVelocity(DashVelocity: Vector2)
	LinearVelocity.PlaneVelocity = DashVelocity
	LinearVelocity.Enabled = true

	RootPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(RootPart.Position, Vector3.new(DashVelocity.X, 0, DashVelocity.Y * 1000))
end

function DisableLinearVelocity()
	LinearVelocity.Enabled = false
end

task.delay(0, function()
	if not CurrentCharInfo then
		local SelectedChar, CharDataTable = Remotes.GetCharacterInfo:InvokeServer()

		if SelectedChar and CharDataTable then
			CurrentCharName = SelectedChar
			CurrentCharInfo = CharDataTable
		end
	end
end)

function Dash(ActionName: string, InputState: Enum.UserInputState)
	if DashMobileButton then
		DashMobileButton.Image = MobileButtonImage
	end

	if IsDashAllowed(ActionName, InputState) then
		if CurrentCharInfo == nil then
			return
		end

		if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health <= 0 then
			return
		end
		
		OnCooldown = true
		task.spawn(HandleCooldown)

		PlayDashAnimation()

		local DashVelocity = GetDashVelocity()
		EnableLinearVelocity(DashVelocity)
		DashEffects()
		HandleDashDuration()
		DisableLinearVelocity()
		
		task.wait(0.3)

		Remotes.Attack:FireServer(1, "Normal")
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction(DashActionName, Dash, true, unpack(DashKeys))

DashMobileButton = ContextActionService:GetButton(DashActionName)

if DashMobileButton then
	DashMobileButton.Image = MobileButtonImage
	DashMobileButton.ImageColor3 = NormalImageColor

from fastapi import FastAPI, HTTPException
from pydantic import BaseModel
from sqlalchemy import create_engine, Column, Integer, String, select
from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker, declarative_base

app = FastAPI()

# ---------- DATABASE SETUP ----------
DATABASE_URL = "sqlite:///./projects.db"

engine = create_engine(DATABASE_URL, connect_args={"check_same_thread": False})
SessionLocal = sessionmaker(autocommit=False, autoflush=False, bind=engine)
Base = declarative_base()


class Project(Base):
    __tablename__ = "projects"

    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
    name = Column(String)
    description = Column(String)


Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)


# ---------- RESPONSE MODEL ----------
class ProjectResponse(BaseModel):
    id: int
    name: str
    description: str


# ---------- API ENDPOINT ----------
@app.get("/projects/{project_id}", response_model=ProjectResponse)
def get_project(project_id: int):
    db = SessionLocal()
    project = db.execute(
        select(Project).where(Project.id == project_id)
    ).scalar_one_or_none()

    if not project:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Project not found")

    return ProjectResponse(
        id=project.id, name=project.name, description=project.description
    )

namespace App\Libraries\Utils {

    class ErpUtils extends BaseUtils
    {

        private static function _buildArrayReturn($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = array();
            foreach ($data as $item) {
                $obj = array();
                foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                    $obj[$output] = $item[$input];
                }
                $return[] = $obj;
            }
            return $return;

        private static function _buildObjectsReturn($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = array();
            foreach ($data as $item) {

                    $obj->{$output} = $item->{$input};
                }
                $return[] = $obj;
            }

        }

        private static function _buildSingleReturn($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = new \stdClass();

            foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                $return->{$output} = $data->{$input};
            }
            return $return;
        }


        private static function _buildSingleReturnAsArray($data, $columns)
        {
            $return = array();

            foreach ($columns as $input => $output) {
                $return[$output] = $data[$input];
            }
            return $return;
        }

        public static function getCompanyAddresses($companyID)
        {
            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'    => 'NOMER',
                'IME'      => 'IME',
                'POST_KOD' => 'POST_KOD',
                'ADRES'    => 'ADRES',
                'TEL'      => 'TEL',
                'KOMENTAR' => 'KOMENTAR',
                'GRAD'     => 'GRAD',
            );

            $addresses = Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI_OBEKTI')
                ->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)))
                ->where('KONTRAGENT_NOMER', $companyID)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();

            $return = self::_buildObjectsReturn($addresses, $inputOutput);
            unset($addresses);
            return $return;
        }


        public static function getCompanyByID($companyID)
        {

            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'            => 'NOMER',
                'KONTRAGENT'       => 'KONTRAGENT',
                'MOL'              => 'MOL',
                'DDSNOMER'         => 'DDSNOMER',
                'BULSTAT'          => 'BULSTAT',
                'SEDALISHTE_GRAD'  => 'SEDALISHTE_GRAD',
                'SEDALISHTE_ADRES' => 'SEDALISHTE_ADRES',
            );

            $company = Services::firebird()->table('KONTRAGENTI')->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)))->where('NOMER', $companyID)->get()->getRow();
            $return = self::_buildSingleReturn($company, $inputOutput);
            unset($company);
            return $return;
        }


        public static function getProductByID($productID, $asArray = false)
        {

            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'         => 'NOMER',
                'IME'           => 'IME',
                'IME$1'         => 'IME$1',
                'OPISANIE_HTML' => 'OPISANIE_HTML',
            );


            $firebird = Services::firebird()->table('POZICII')->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)))->where('NOMER', $productID);
            if ($asArray) {
                $product = $firebird->get()->getRowArray();
                $return = self::_buildSingleReturnAsArray($product, $inputOutput);
            } else {
                $product = $firebird->get()->getRow();
                $return = self::_buildSingleReturn($product, $inputOutput);
            }
            unset($product);
            return $return;
        }

        {





            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'         => 'NOMER',
                'IME'           => 'IME',
                'IME$1'         => 'IME$1',
                'IME$2'         => 'IME$2',
                'IZKLUCHEN'     => 'IZKLUCHEN',

            );

            $firebird = Services::firebird()->table('POZICII')->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)));

            } else {
                $products = $firebird->get()->getResult();
                $return = self::_buildObjectsReturn($products, $inputOutput);
            }

            return $return;
        }


        public static function getOfferByID($offerID)
        {

            $inputOutput = array(
                'POS_NOMER' => 'POS_NOMER',
            );


            $offerProducts = Services::firebird()->table('OFERTI')

                ->join('OFERTI_DE', 'OFERTI.NOMER = OFERTI_DE.OFERTA_NOMER')
                ->where('OFERTI.NOMER', $offerID)
                ->get()
                ->getResult();

            return $return;
        }

        {
            $inputOutput = array(
                'NOMER'    => 'NOMER',

            );


            $priceTypes = Services::firebird()->table('TIPOVE_CENI')->select(implode(', ', ($inputOutput)))->get()->getResult();


            $return = self::_buildObjectsReturn($priceTypes, $inputOutput);
            unset($priceTypes);
            return $return;
        }
    }
}

local function GetClosestToFOV()
    local closestPlayer=nil
    local closestDist=math.huge
    for _,enemy in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if enemy~=plr and enemy.Character and enemy.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local hrp=enemy.Character.HumanoidRootPart
            local screenPos,vis=Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(hrp.Position)
            if vis then

                if dist<FOV and dist<closestDist then
                    closestDist=dist
                    closestPlayer=enemy
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return closestPlayer
